page_content: The page discusses the promotion of basic competencies in areas like language, mathematics, and information and communication technologies for adults.
The page discusses coordinated construction efforts on the Zürichstrasse in Oftringen, including road repairs and the installation of a noise barrier.
The page focuses on sustainable development in municipalities, offering information on funding opportunities and networking events.
The page provides information on special schools and vocational training programs for children and young adults with disabilities.
The page discusses a project where students engaged in creative activities related to urban planning and public spaces.
The page provides an overview of research projects supported by the Department of Education, Culture, and Sports, focusing on various educational topics.
The page discusses the successful implementation of the 2017–2022 Cultural Concept according to a report, including its impact and future plans.
The page discusses a survey on customer satisfaction in public transport, highlighting improvements and areas for potential enhancement.
The page discusses the opening of a new bike path in Untersiggenthal, part of the cantonal bike routes plan, aimed at increasing safety for all road users.
